Module: where

module:where

Query conditions generator.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
conditions Object <optional>
 {} Query criteria mapping column names (optionally including operation eg 'my_field <>') to the parameter values. Predicates generated from a criteria object are joined together with `and`; an `or` key denotes an array of nested criteria objects, the collected predicates from each of which are parenthesized and joined with `or`.
offset Number <optional>
 0 Added to the token index value in the prepared statement (with offset 0, parameters will start $1, $2, $3).
prefix String <optional>
 '\nWHERE ' SQL snippet prefixed to the generated predicate string.
generator String <optional>
 generator Generator functions mutate the SQL output.
Source:
  • lib/query/where.js, line 373
Returns:
An object representing the query conditions. The `conditions` field contains the final SQL string, the `params` field the parameters for the prepared statement, and the `predicates` field the raw predicate mapping.
Type
Object

Members

module:where

Query conditions generator.
Source:
  • lib/query/where.js, line 373

(inner, constant) ops

Operation definitions for parsing criteria objects. Keys are search strings in criteria keys. Values define an output SQL operator and an optional mutator which will be applied to the appropriate parameter value for the prepared statement.
Properties:
Name Type Description
"="
"!"
">"
"<"
">="
"<="
"!="
"<>"
"@>"
"<@"
"&&"
"~~"
like
"!~~"
"not like"
"~~*"
ilike
"!~~*"
"not ilike"
"similar to"
"not similar to"
"~"
"!~"
"~*"
"!~*"
"is distinct from"
"is not distinct from"

(inner) generateDisjunction(conditions, offset, generator) → {Object}

Build a disjunction (logical OR).
Parameters:
Name Type Description
conditions Array An array of nested criteria objects. Individual objects will be arrayified (so an 'or' key can work with a single object).
offset Number Offset prepared statement parameter ordinals.
generator function Generator function to use to build SQL predicates.
